channel.title: AI on Off The Clock Maven
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Off The Clock Maven

item.title: Beyond the Bubble: Deconstructing Market Concentration in the AI Era
item.description: An in-depth analysis of the historic S&P 500 market concentration in the AI era. This report deconstructs why today's market, led by the Magnificent 7, is fundamentally different from the dot-com bubble, focusing on profitability and cash flow. It explores the risks of high valuations and offers strategic investment insights for navigating a top-heavy market.

item.title: The AI Energy Crisis: A Deep Dive into the Trillion-Dollar Power Problem
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of the AI-induced energy crisis, exploring the market cycle, key corporate players in cooling and power, their financial health, and the long-term solutions like SMRs.

item.title: AMD's Ascent: Deconstructing the OpenAI Deal and Valuing a New AI Titan
item.description: A deep-dive analysis of the landmark AMD-OpenAI partnership, its financial impact, and a data-driven valuation of AMD as a new titan in the AI hardware market.
